name: ChEMBL
short_summary: Curated bioactivity database for drug discovery; strong baseline for activity curation and QSAR benchmarking.
license_notes: Validate commercial usage and redistribution constraints for curated subsets.
excelra_leverage: Curate/standardize bioactivity packs for customers; enrich GoStar with assay/target/compound links; create benchmark-ready training sets.
notes: Map identifiers to Excelra standards + provenance rules.

name: PubChem
short_summary: Large public chemistry resource (structures, bioassays, links) for discovery enrichment and ID mapping.
license_notes: Public; validate redistribution rules for packaged extracts.
excelra_leverage: Use for synonym expansion + compound enrichment; build standardized compound registry and crosswalks used across BUs.
notes: Useful to validate customer compound lists and fill missing metadata.

name: RDKit
short_summary: Cheminformatics toolkit: standardization, descriptors, substructure search, fingerprints, and conversion.
license_notes: Verify license compatibility with internal distribution models.
excelra_leverage: Foundation for molecule standardization services; power structure-cleaning pipelines behind GoStar/curation deliverables.
notes: Core building block for SMILES cleanup + canonicalization + salts.

name: Open Reaction Database (ORD)
short_summary: Structured reaction data resource supporting reproducible reaction ML and reaction data standardization.
license_notes: Validate specific dataset licenses for downstream redistribution.
excelra_leverage: Build a reaction curation pipeline offering (standardize reactions, conditions, yields); benchmark reaction prediction models on clean curated sets.
notes: Good for building a reaction KG and standardized reaction templates.

name: ZINC
short_summary: Compound catalogs used broadly for virtual screening and docking workflows.
license_notes: Check terms for bulk download and commercial usage.
excelra_leverage: Offer curated screening-ready libraries; package subsets by target class/physchem for customer programs; support docking pipeline demos.
notes: Use as a standard library for screening PoCs.

name: ClinicalTrials.gov
short_summary: Global clinical trial registry; essential for trial landscape, sponsor pipelines, and evidence tracking.
license_notes: Public registry; validate redistribution if packaging extracts.
excelra_leverage: Build trial intelligence products (trial matching, feasibility, competitive landscape); curate endpoints/arms/eligibility into structured datasets.
notes: Base source for trial extraction and analytics.

name: AACT (ClinicalTrials.gov in SQL)
short_summary: SQL-friendly mirror of ClinicalTrials.gov to simplify ETL and analytics workflows.
license_notes: Public; confirm downstream redistribution rules.
excelra_leverage: Accelerate delivery of trial data marts and dashboards; produce standardized trial extracts for clients and internal products.
notes: Great for repeatable analytics and KPI dashboards.

name: openFDA (Drugs APIs)
short_summary: FDA open APIs for labels, adverse events, and other drug data useful for regulatory intelligence.
license_notes: Public; validate usage limits and redistribution for packaged outputs.
excelra_leverage: Create automated label parsing + safety signal dashboards; extract structured label elements and integrate into Excelra products.
notes: Useful for text extraction and regulatory monitoring.

name: MIMIC-IV (PhysioNet)
short_summary: Large de-identified EHR dataset (credentialed access); valuable for RWD/clinical ML research and methods.
license_notes: Restricted access; approvals required; do not redistribute.
excelra_leverage: Use only for approved internal research PoCs demonstrating RWD pipelines; design playbooks for compliant RWD engagement models.
notes: Red flag forces governance and approvals.

name: UniProt
short_summary: Protein sequence and functional annotation hub; essential for target intelligence and mapping.
license_notes: Public; validate redistribution rules for derived extracts.
excelra_leverage: Build target intelligence packs; harmonize identifiers across data sources; enrich internal KGs and product datasets.
notes: Core reference for gene/protein mapping.

name: Ensembl
short_summary: Genome annotation and reference; supports variant/gene mapping and genomic context pipelines.
license_notes: Public; confirm redistribution terms if bundling outputs.
excelra_leverage: Offer variant-to-target curation and standardized genomic mapping services; provide clean gene models for downstream analytics.
notes: Useful for canonical mapping in pipelines.

name: Gene Ontology (GO)
short_summary: Standard ontology for biological process/molecular function/cellular component annotations.
license_notes: Public; follow attribution conventions for derived graphs.
excelra_leverage: Standardize functional annotation layers in Excelra deliverables; build KG edges for pathway/function enrichment and reasoning.
notes: Critical for enrichment workflows.

name: cBioPortal
short_summary: Cancer genomics portal for exploration and cohort analysis; widely used in translational research.
license_notes: Public portal; validate rules for programmatic reuse and redistribution of extracted data.
excelra_leverage: Demonstrate oncology cohort-based target/biomarker narratives; design analytics views that Excelra could package in products/services.
notes: Strong leader-friendly UI reference.

name: Open Targets Platform
short_summary: Target–disease evidence platform integrating genetics, drugs, pathways, expression and more.
license_notes: Verify licensing for commercial use and redistribution.
excelra_leverage: Power target intelligence offerings; enrich GoStar/GoBiom evidence layers; build curated evidence packs aligned to customer target lists.
notes: High-impact cross-BU foundation.

name: Therapeutics Data Commons (TDC)
short_summary: Benchmark datasets + standardized ML tasks for drug discovery; accelerates evaluation and baseline building.
license_notes: Underlying datasets vary; validate per dataset for internal packaging.
excelra_leverage: Create a reusable internal benchmarking harness; show clients measurable uplift when using Excelra-curated data vs raw public sets.
notes: Use to standardize evaluations across teams.

name: PubTator Central
short_summary: Biomedical entity annotations for literature; strong accelerator for NER/entity linking pipelines.
license_notes: Validate reuse terms for derived annotation exports.
excelra_leverage: Build literature extraction pipelines feeding KGs and product evidence layers; reduce manual curation via pre-annotated entities.
notes: Good for RAG grounding corpora and entity graphs.

name: Europe PMC
short_summary: Literature platform with APIs; useful for building literature search, alerts, and RAG corpora.
license_notes: Validate API usage limits and redistribution for stored corpora.
excelra_leverage: Build a leader-friendly literature intelligence layer: topic monitors, evidence summaries, and curated corpora aligned to customer targets.
notes: Use for reliable retrieval sources.

name: ESM (Protein language models)
short_summary: Protein language model toolkit for embeddings; supports target similarity and sequence-based analytics.
license_notes: Check model weight license for commercial use and redistribution.
excelra_leverage: Offer sequence-based target similarity analytics; integrate embeddings as features in target intelligence and KG enrichment pipelines.
notes: High value, but apply license governance.

name: nf-core
short_summary: Community-curated Nextflow pipelines for genomics/transcriptomics; accelerates robust bioinformatics workflows.
license_notes: Validate specific pipeline licenses and container usage policies for customer delivery.
excelra_leverage: Accelerate delivery of standardized omics processing; package ‘validated pipeline + curated outputs’ as service offerings.
notes: Use to speed up repeatable workflows.

name: MONDO Disease Ontology
short_summary: Unified disease ontology supporting consistent disease normalization and cross-source mapping.
license_notes: Public; follow attribution and reuse conventions.
excelra_leverage: Standardize disease terms across trials, safety, targets, and evidence; improve matching and analytics quality in client deliverables.
notes: Key to harmonizing disease labels.

name: DrugBank
short_summary: Comprehensive drug knowledge base; highly valuable but typically restricted/commercial.
license_notes: Usually requires paid licensing; avoid redistribution; enforce compliance checks.
excelra_leverage: If licensed, enrich product evidence layers and KGs with drug-target, indications, interactions; otherwise keep as ‘restricted reference’.
notes: Red flag forces governance and procurement review.

name: Cytoscape
short_summary: Network visualization platform; widely used to explore pathways and knowledge graphs.
license_notes: Open; validate plugin licenses if packaging workflows.
excelra_leverage: Provide leader-friendly KG/network visualizations for GoStar/GoBiom insights; rapid demos for partnership/customer discussions.
notes: Great for storytelling and exploration.

name: FAIR Guiding Principles (paper/reference)
short_summary: Foundational reference for making data Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, and Reusable.
license_notes: Paper use is fine; apply principles to internal standards and client deliverables.
excelra_leverage: Position Excelra’s curation/standardization offerings with an industry-standard framework; define internal metadata + provenance checklists.
notes: Use as governance anchor for ‘quality’ discussions.
